overview: The Mediterranean movie directed by Hadi Hajatmand and produced by Rashid Hajatmand, (ShowBox), starring Mehraveh Sharifinia, Behrang Alavi and Pouria Poursorkh, was released in cinemas across the country in 1400. Saberullah Dadian has written this film. Synopsis: Hadi Hajatmand's second feature film has a social theme and deals with the life of a loving couple who are involved in various problems and adventures...
title: Mediterranean
